title: Relevance releases 2026 Healthcare SEO & GEO Playbook to help healthcare brands win in Google and AI answer engines
description: Columbia, MO, Jan. 22, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Relevance, an AI visibility (GEO) and SEO agency, today announced the release of its 2026 Healthcare SEO & GEO Playbook, a practical, execution-first report designed to help healthcare organizations increase discoverability across traditional search and generative answer platforms.As more patient journeys begin (and end) inside AI-generated results, healthcare marketing teams face a new reality: it's no longer enough to rank. Brands also need to be referenced, summarized, and recommended accurately by the tools patients are using to narrow options before they ever click a website. The 2026 playbook lays out how to do that without compromising compliance, medical accuracy, or trust."Healthcare marketing has always been harder than most categories. Higher stakes, stricter compliance, more skepticism," said Tim Worstell, president of Relevance. "What changed is the discovery layer. Your next patient may never see ten blue links. They'll ...Full story available on Benzinga.com

title: Meta cuts hundreds of California jobs in pivot from metaverse to AI
description: Meta will lay off hundreds in California as it moves resources from the metaverse to AI, affecting major offices in Burlingame and Playa Vista.
